verses.roman:
caudda-śata sāta śake janmera pramāṇa
caudda-śata pañcānne ha-ila antardhāna

synonyms: caudda-śata—1400 (A.D. 1479); sāta—and seven; śake—in the Śaka Era; janmera—of birth; pramāṇa—evidence; caudda-śata pañcānne—in the year 1455 (A.D. 1534); ha-ila—became; antardhāna—disappearance.
translation: In the year 1407 of the Śaka Era (A.D. 1486), Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu appeared, and in the year 1455 (A.D. 1534) He disappeared from this world.
